name: TVM Ceramic Mug (3 Sizes)
description:
This mug will be a favorite for everyone from your sweet grandma to your teenage brother. With the right message, a mug can become anyone’s treasured companion for years to come.


• Ceramic

• 11 oz mug dimensions: 3.85″ (9.8 cm) in height, 3.35″ (8.5 cm) in diameter

• 15 oz mug dimensions: 4.7″ (12 cm) in height, 3.35″ (8.5 cm) in diameter

• 20 oz mug dimensions: 4.3″ (10.9 cm) in height, 3.7″ (9.3 cm) in diameter

• Dishwasher and microwave safe

• Blank product sourced from China


This product is made especially for you as soon as you place an order, which is why it takes us a bit longer to deliver it to you. Making products on demand instead of in bulk helps reduce overproduction, so thank you for making thoughtful purchasing decisions!
